page.title: 16Worship in Paulerspury
page.content:
There is a United Reformed Church in the village. Services are held at 6 o'clock on Sunday evenings. Reverend Bolton is the chief minister and he lives in Newport Pagnell.
Peter Townsend is the Rector of Saint James' church. He came to Paulerspury in 1974 and conducts four services each Sunday. He has about eight weddings and six christenings a year.
In Pury End there is a little Methodist church which is not used very much now. The minister is Reverend Collings who lives in Buckingham.
